price: (35) Every soul will taste death. And We test you with evil and with good as trial; and to Us you will be returned.
arabic: كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ ذَآئِقَةُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِۗ وَنَبۡلُوكُم بِٱلشَّرِّ وَٱلۡخَيۡرِ فِتۡنَةٗۖ وَإِلَيۡنَا تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: kullu nafsin dhāiqatu al-mawti wanablūkum bil-shari wal-khayri fit'natan wa-ilaynā tur'jaʿūna
